desc: Ah Pau Chop started in the year 1950s, from a push cart to a booming wholesaler, that serves the community with a ground motto of "Preserving the Chinese Heritage dish by dish." Our shop carries all range of dried provisions, from ginseng, dried scallops, dried shrimps to dried mushrooms, fish maw and abalone etc

layout.text:
How Ah Pau Chop
came to be
